issue.title: [C++] Benchmark for Parquet float and NaN encoding/decoding
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6045](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6045). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It is possible that one point Parquet NaN encoding was slower, so it's worth extending the benchmarks for Parquet to do floats in general and NaNs in particular.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6045?focusedCommentId=16894157) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4915
